name: 洪魏寬
objective: 本課程將介紹：(1)基礎量子力學，(2)古典固態理論，(3)晶格結構與x-ray繞射，(4)電子結構理論，(5)表面效應，(6)半導體特性專論。
schedule:
1.Introduction 
2.Overview
3.Basic concepts of quantum mechanics
4.Crystal structure 
5.Reciprocal lattice and x-ray diffraction
6.Lattice vibrations, phonons
7.Free electron gas
8.Review
9.Midterm
10.Electronic structure (I)
11.Electronic structure (II)
12.Transport properties
13.Optical properties (I)
14.Optical properties (II)
15.Optical properties (III)
16.Semiconductors and their nanostructures
17.Final reports
18.Final reports
materials:
1. Charles Kittel, Introduction to Solid State Physics, 8th ed., 2004 (Wiley).
2. Mark Fox, Optical Properties of Solids, 2001 (Oxford).
